message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split in my favor. I believe it's a fair offer considering time is of the essence.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the game's dynamics.  Let's make a deal!
Bob, it seems we both want a larger share. How about we settle for a 55/45 split in my favor this time?  It reflects a similar ratio to your offer but accounts for the time pressure.
